onSubscriptionsChanged().Description: Callback invoked when there is any change to any SubscriptionInfo, as well as once on registering for changes with @B_android#telephony#SubscriptionManager#addOnSubscriptionsChangedListener_E@. Typically this method would invoke @B_android#telephony#SubscriptionManager#getActiveSubscriptionInfoList_E@

ClassDesc: A listener class for monitoring changes to @B_android#telephony#SubscriptionInfo_E@ records. Override the onSubscriptionsChanged method in the object that extends this class and pass it to @B_android#telephony#SubscriptionManager#addOnSubscriptionsChangedListener_E@ to register your listener and to unregister invoke @B_android#telephony#SubscriptionManager#removeOnSubscriptionsChangedListener_E@ Permissions android.Manifest.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE is required for #onSubscriptionsChanged to be invoked.
